Message: The user completes the submission of the form
Why are my ads still pending

If your ads are still pending, it could be due to a few reasons. If your account is new and not yet verified, you will need to provide some additional information for verification. Please email adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification and include the following details:
- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number
Once we receive this information, we will conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status. The ad approval process usually takes between 1-2 business days. Sometimes even earlier thanks to our awesome Ad Ops team! You can find more details here: [How to create your first ad](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17618196971149-How-to-create-your-first-ad).
I'm here to help with whatever you need! Let me know your question, and I'll do my best to assist you right away.
How do I speak to a person

I understand that you want to speak to a person. While I'm here to help with any questions or issues you have, you can also reach out to our support team via email at adsupport@newsbreak.com for further assistance.
How set up a max conversion campaign

To set up a Maximize Conversions campaign, follow these steps:
1. Access Ad Management.
2. Create a new campaign under the 'Conversion' objective column. You have two options: 'Website Conversions' or 'App Install.'
3. Select an event to track within your Ad Set.
4. Click the dropdown under ‘Choose your event to track’ and select ‘Create new event.'
5. In Event Management, click ‘Create event.’
6. Name your event, decide on your event tracking type, and follow the 3-step-process to integrate your Pixel or Postback.
7. Test Pixel or Postback.
For more detailed instructions, you can refer to this article: [Introduction to Maximize Conversions](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/20624355375117-Introduction-to-Maximize-Conversions).
